pageContext.claim: “In Wisconsin, over 90,000 ballots were illegally harvested. Can't do that. Not allowed to. Through so-called human drop boxes. And over 500 illegal unmanned drop boxes were put out statewide.”
pageContext.analysis: Ballot harvesting is permitted in Wisconsin. Drop boxes in Wisconsin were bolted to the ground, locked with a security seal and monitored by security cameras as required by the Wisconsin Elections Commission. Trump's lawsuit in the state challenging the drop box rules was rejected.
